Package edu.citadel.cprl

Class Parser

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.citadel.cprl.Parser
  • public class Parser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class uses recursive descent to perform syntax analysis of the CPRL source language and to generate an abstract syntax tree.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Parser​(Scanner scanner)
      Construct a parser with the specified scanner.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<Expression> parseActualParameters()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      actualParameters = "(" expressions ")" .
      ArrayTypeDecl parseArrayTypeDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      arrayTypeDecl = "type" typeId "=" "array" "[" intConstValue "]" "of" typeName ";" .
      AssignmentStmt parseAssignmentStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      assignmentStmt = variable ":=" expression ";" .
      ConstDecl parseConstDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      constDecl = "const" constId ":=" literal ";" .
      ConstValue parseConstValue()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      constValue = literal | constId .
      DeclarativePart parseDeclarativePart()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      declarativePart = initialDecls subprogramDecls .
      ExitStmt parseExitStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      exitStmt = "exit" ( "when" booleanExpr )? ";" .
      Expression parseExpression()
      Parse the following grammar rules:
      expression = relation ( logicalOp relation )* .
      logicalOp = "and" | "or" .
      java.util.List<Expression> parseExpressions()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      expressions = expression ( "," expression )* .
      Expression parseFactor()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      factor = "not" factor | constValue | namedValue | functionCall | "(" expression ")" .
      java.util.List<ParameterDecl> parseFormalParameters()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      formalParameters = "(" parameterDecl ( "," parameterDecl )* ")" .
      FunctionCall parseFunctionCall()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      functionCall = functId ( actualParameters )? .
      FunctionDecl parseFunctionDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      functionDecl = "function" funcId ( formalParameters )? "return" typeName "is" initialDecls statementPart funcId ";" .
      java.util.List<Token> parseIdentifiers()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      identifiers = identifier ( "," identifier )* .
      IfStmt parseIfStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      ifStmt = "if" booleanExpr "then" statements
      ( "elsif" booleanExpr "then" statements )*
      ( "else" statements )? "end" "if" ";" .
      InitialDecl parseInitialDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      initialDecl = constDecl | arrayTypeDecl | varDecl .
      java.util.List<InitialDecl> parseInitialDecls()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      initialDecls = ( initialDecl )* .
      Token parseLiteral()
      Parse the following grammar rules:
      literal = intLiteral | charLiteral | stringLiteral | booleanLiteral .
      booleanLiteral = "true" | "false" .
      LoopStmt parseLoopStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      loopStmt = ( "while" booleanExpr )? "loop" statements "end" "loop" ";" .
      NamedValue parseNamedValue()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      namedValue = variable .
      ParameterDecl parseParameterDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      parameterDecl = ( "var" )? paramId ":" typeName .
      ProcedureCallStmt parseProcedureCallStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      procedureCallStmt = procId ( actualParameters )? ";" .
      ProcedureDecl parseProcedureDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      procedureDecl = "procedure" procId ( formalParameters )? "is" initialDecls statementPart procId ";" .
      Program parseProgram()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      program = declarativePart statementPart "." .
      ReadStmt parseReadStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      readStmt = "read" variable ";" .
      Expression parseRelation()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      relation = simpleExpr ( relationalOp simpleExpr )? .
      relationalOp = "=" | "!=" | "<" | "<=" | ">" | ">=" .
      ReturnStmt parseReturnStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      returnStmt = "return" ( expression )? ";" .
      Expression parseSimpleExpr()
      Parse the following grammar rules:
      simpleExpr = ( addingOp )? term ( addingOp term )* .
      addingOp = "+" | "-" .
      Statement parseStatement()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      statement = assignmentStmt | ifStmt | loopStmt | exitStmt | readStmt | writeStmt | writelnStmt | procedureCallStmt | returnStmt .
      StatementPart parseStatementPart()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      statementPart = "begin" statements "end" .
      java.util.List<Statement> parseStatements()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      statements = ( statement )* .
      SubprogramDecl parseSubprogramDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      subprogramDecl = procedureDecl | functionDecl .
      java.util.List<SubprogramDecl> parseSubprogramDecls()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      subprogramDecls = ( subprogramDecl )* .
      Expression parseTerm()
      Parse the following grammar rules:
      term = factor ( multiplyingOp factor )* .
      multiplyingOp = "*" | "/" | "mod" .
      Type parseTypeName()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      typeName = "Integer" | "Boolean" | "Char" | typeId .
      VarDecl parseVarDecl()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      varDecl = "var" identifiers ":" typeName ";" .
      Variable parseVariable()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      variable = ( varId | paramId ) ( "[" expression "]" )* .
      Variable parseVariableExpr()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      variable = ( varId | paramId ) ( "[" expression "]" )* .
      This method provides common logic for methods parseVariable() and parseNamedValue().
      WritelnStmt parseWritelnStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      writelnStmt = "writeln" ( expressions )? ";" .
      WriteStmt parseWriteStmt()
      Parse the following grammar rule:
      writeStmt = "write" expressions ";" .

      • parseVariableExpr

        public Variable parseVariableExpr()
                           throws java.io.IOException,
                                  ParserException
        Parse the following grammar rule:
        variable = ( varId | paramId ) ( "[" expression "]" )* .
        This method provides common logic for methods parseVariable() and parseNamedValue(). The method does not handle any ParserExceptions but throws them back to the calling method where they can be handled appropriately.
        Returns:
        the parsed variable.
        Throws:
        ParserException - if parsing fails.
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        parseVariable(), parseNamedValue()
